column1:
20:13|8:13 P.M.
What a day! When Ally finally settled onto her couch
column2: after giving Knickers a long walk
column3: she was exhausted. She leaned back and kicked off her shoes. There had been a few moments of tightness in her chest—maybe it was psychological
column4: anxiety‑induced—but that was gone now.|Syndrome|Thomas Hoover
